extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the ARD Computer Info field #1 from the Computer Information attributes in the Apple Remote Desktop settings of a machine.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/Library/Preferences/com.apple.RemoteDesktop.plist" ]; then echo "<result>`/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.RemoteDesktop Text1`</result>" fi
